item.description:
Hi Packers,

I hope your week is going well so far, it should be after another great win at the weekend, the Banshee was packed with green and gold, and the game was unbelievable, thank you to the huge crowd that turned out Iâ€™d say it was our biggest yet. This weeks game is at 3.00pm on Sunday in Chicago, those of you that are making the trip to Soldier Field we hope you have a great time, for everyone else both floors will be open again (2nd floor open from 2pm) and hopefully we will have our biggest crowd for the season so far. As usual we will beer and food specials, GO PACK lets take Chicago.

Ray Butler

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: Green Bay v Chicago
